mapper.update:
update SYS_MODULES
MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_DESC = #{moduleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_TYPE = #{moduleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARENT = #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODULE_URL = #{moduleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
I_LEVEL = #{iLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LEAF = #{leaf,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
APPLICATION = #{application,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTROLLER = #{controller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ENABLE = #{enable,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_MODULES set MODULE_NAME = #{moduleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_DESC = #{moduleDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_TYPE = #{moduleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT = #{parent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODULE_URL = #{moduleUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, I_LEVEL = #{iLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LEAF = #{leaf,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPLICATION = #{application,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTROLLER = #{controller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ENABLE = #{enable,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where MODULE_ID = #{moduleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
